This catalog describes common errors enc: This catalog describes common errors encountered in MBC CQRS Serverless, their causes, and solutions.
Optimistic locking failure. The version: Optimistic locking failure. The version number in the request does not match the current version in the database.
Attempting to update an item that does n: Attempting to update an item that does not exist in the database.
Using a version in publishSync that does: Using a version in publishSync that does not match the latest saved version.
Fetch the latest item and use its versio: Fetch the latest item and use its version, or use version: -1 with async methods.
The specified tenant does not exist or h: The specified tenant does not exist or has been deleted.
Attempting to create a tenant with an ex: Attempting to create a tenant with an existing code.
Use a different tenant code, or reuse th: Use a different tenant code, or reuse the existing code if recreating after deletion.
The request DTO failed class-validator v: The request DTO failed class-validator validation.
Read or write capacity has been exceeded: Read or write capacity has been exceeded.
Same as version not match error above -: Same as version not match error above - refresh and retry.
Invalid input or business rule violation: Invalid input or business rule violation
Check CloudWatch logs for Lambda errors: Check CloudWatch logs for Lambda errors
Verify environment variables are correct: Verify environment variables are correctly set
Confirm DynamoDB tables exist with corre: Confirm DynamoDB tables exist with correct schema
